# ForestSplats
[WACV'26] ForestSplats: Deformable transient field for Gaussian Splatting in the Wild
[[ArXiv](https://arxiv.org/abs/2503.06179)]   [[Project Page](https://kalelpark.github.io/ForestSplats/)]
